item.description:
Special Afro Cuban Workshop

with

World Renowned
Gordon Neil!

IN BOSTON FOR 1 DAY ONLY.......

Saturday, April 26!

Joining us for 1 DAY ONLY
Straight off his European Tour

First Time in Boston!

No partner necessary...
Pay in Advance and Save $20!
Limited Space Available!

Online Registration is now Open!
Limited Space Available!

12-1pm: Afro-Cuban/Caribbean Body Movement
------------------------------------------
1-2pm: Incorporating Afro-Cuban Movement into SOCIAL DANCING
------------------------------------------

Advance Price: $20/worshop or BOTH FOR ONLY $30!
@ Door: $25/workshop, $40 Both

REGISTER ONLINE NOW!

HOW TO REGISTER: Pay through meetup for both workshops or visit the following link to sign up for single classes:
http://www.masacoteen...

Dance Companies & Student Groups, Email us for Discounts!


Don't Miss Out on this ONE OF A KIND workshop!


Rather Pay by Check? Email us at info@masacoteentertainment.com

Gordon will also be available for privates during his visit.
Contact us ASAP to schedule a lesson.

ABOUT GORDON | SCHEDULE | LOCATION
CONTACT US FOR MORE INFORMATION

Brought to you by Masacote Entertainment, the Boston/Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group, & Metamovements!

NO Refunds will be made.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the front desk! -- Ana
item.why: Gordon is an AMAZING dancer & an even better instructor! This is his first time teaching in Boston, and you don't want to miss out!

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Special AFRO CUBAN/Caribbean Body Movement Workshop with GORDON NEIL!
